species.Description: binomial species name from NCBI Taxonomy (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi)

strain.Description: string value indicating the strain of the species

strain_identifier.Description: string value indicating a strain identifier (e.g. RRID or ILAR).

age.Description: Age of the animal at first acquisition, in weeks.

weight.Description: Weight of the animal at first acquisition, in grams.
